attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the young community deserve more things to get us out and not stuck indoors bored.

So we have a skatepark. But not a very good one. We need lights to see. And more things to be there instead of a halfpipe and a jumpbox. So even if your not local sign. And you'll do a great deed to the young children of the south east of England.

Thanks for your time!

rejection.details: We suggest you re-write this petition, so that your title (the text in bold) makes a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, and the following text sets out clearly what changes you would like to see.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
